intervals.name: Merge Overlapping Intervals
intervals.description: Given a list of intervals, merge all overlapping intervals and return the condensed list sorted by start times.

intervals.name: Insert Interval Into Sorted List
intervals.description: Insert a new interval into an existing sorted list of non-overlapping intervals, merging as necessary. Return the updated list.
intervals.signature: def insert(intervals: List[List[int]], new: List[int]) -> List[List[int]]:

intervals.name: Meeting Rooms - Can Attend All
intervals.description: Given meeting intervals, determine if a person can attend all meetings by checking for overlap after sorting by start times.

intervals.name: Meeting Rooms II - Minimum Rooms Required
intervals.description: Given meeting intervals, return the minimum number of conference rooms required using a min-heap of end times.

intervals.name: Erase Overlapping Intervals
intervals.description: Return the minimum number of intervals to remove so the rest are non-overlapping by sorting and applying greedy selection.

intervals.name: Minimum Arrows to Burst Balloons
intervals.description: Given intervals representing balloon ranges, return the minimum number of arrows needed to burst all balloons using greedy overlap logic.

intervals.name: Merge Two Sorted Interval Lists
intervals.description: Merge two sorted interval lists into one sorted result while preserving interval structure. No merging of overlaps required.
intervals.signature: def merge_two_interval_lists(a: List[List[int]], b: List[List[int]]) -> List[List[int]]:
